data.comment: The big names in today's match at Earthquakes Stadium have now been confirmed.
The first-half is just kicking off.
In the minute 5, San Jose are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
San Jose have been awarded a corner by Tim Ford.
Tim Ford signals a throw-in for San Jose, close to Los Angeles's area.
In the minute 19, Corner awarded to San Jose.
San Jose have been awarded a corner by Tim Ford.
Free kick for Los Angeles in their own half.
In the minute 21, Andy Rios (San Jose) has received a yellow card from Tim Ford.
Throw-in San Jose.
Can Los Angeles capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 23, Goal! Latif Blessing gives Los Angeles a 0-1 lead in San Jose.
Great play from Diego Rossi to set up the goal.
In San Jose a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 26, Goal kick for Los Angeles at Earthquakes Stadium.
Corner awarded to San Jose.
Eduard Atuesta is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
In the minute 28, Cristian Espinoza instrumental with a fine assist.
San Jose have been awarded a corner by Tim Ford.
Tim Ford awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 33, Tim Ford signals a free kick to San Jose.
Francisco Ginella for Los Angeles has been booked by Tim Ford and receives a first yellow card.
Ball safe as Los Angeles is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 36, Tim Ford signals a San Jose throw-in in Los Angeles's half.
Chris Wondolowski puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 2-1.
That's a fine assist from Cristian Espinoza.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for San Jose at Earthquakes Stadium.
Cristian Espinoza (San Jose) strikes â€“ and hits the bar! Ohhhh so close!
San Jose awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 42, Corner awarded to Los Angeles.
Los Angeles have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Los Angeles in the half of San Jose.
In the minute 43, Tim Ford signals a free kick to San Jose in their own half.
Throw-in for San Jose in the half of Los Angeles.
Los Angeles awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for San Jose in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Tim Ford awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Earthquakes Stadium.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Free kick Los Angeles.
Bob Bradley (Los Angeles) is making a first substitution, with Jordan Harvey replacing Tristan Blackmon.
In the minute 46, The away team replace Francisco Ginella with Carlos Vela.
Corner awarded to Los Angeles.
In the minute 48, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Los Angeles capitalize from this throw-in deep inside San Jose's half?
Tim Ford awards San Jose a goal kick.
In the minute 49, San Jose are in shooting range from this free kick.
Ball safe as Los Angeles is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 51, Los Angeles awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Earthquakes Stadium, Judson has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Tim Ford signals a free kick to San Jose in their own half.
Can Los Angeles get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in San Jose's half?
In the minute 53, Free kick for San Jose in their own half.
San Jose to take a throw-in in Los Angeles territory.
Tim Ford signals a free kick to Los Angeles just outside San Jose's area.
In the minute 55, Los Angeles pushes forward through Brian Rodriguez, whose finish on goal is saved.
San Jose needs to be cautious. Los Angeles have an attacking throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 56, It's a goal kick for the home team in San Jose.
Los Angeles are pushing forward but Diego Rossi's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a San Jose goal kick.
In the minute 58, Los Angeles have been awarded a corner by Tim Ford.
Los Angeles's Diego Rossi is on target but unsuccessful.
San Jose have a goal kick.
In the minute 60, Corner awarded to Los Angeles.
Tim Ford signals a free kick to Los Angeles.
At Earthquakes Stadium, Jackson Yueill has been booked for the second time in this match. An early shower is now waiting!
In the minute 62, Los Angeles drives forward and Eduard Atuesta gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Can San Jose get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Los Angeles's half?
The home team have replaced Andy Rios with Luis Felipe. This is the first substitution made today by Matias Jesus Almeyda.
In the minute 66, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for San Jose close to the penalty box.
Los Angeles's Jesus Murillo has been booked in San Jose.
Chris Wondolowski of San Jose gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 67, Goal kick for Los Angeles at Earthquakes Stadium.
Los Angeles push upfield but Tim Ford quickly pulls them for offside.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Carlos Fierro for San Jose who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 69, Shea Salinas (San Jose) has replaced the possibly injured Carlos Fierro at Earthquakes Stadium.
Throw-in for Los Angeles in the half of San Jose.
In San Jose, Los Angeles push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 72, Cristian Espinoza puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 3-1.
Shea Salinas with an assist there.
Throw-in for Los Angeles close to the penalty box.
In the minute 75, San Jose's Cristian Espinoza has run offside.
Throw-in for San Jose at Earthquakes Stadium.
San Jose are coming forward and Cristian Espinoza gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 77, It's a goal kick for the away team in San Jose.
Throw-in high up the field for Los Angeles in San Jose.
Los Angeles have been awarded a corner by Tim Ford.
In the minute 78, Free kick for San Jose in their own half.
Throw-in for San Jose close to the penalty box.
Tim Ford signals a free kick to Los Angeles in their own half.
In the minute 83, Los Angeles have a dangerous throw-in.
Bob Bradley is making the team's fourth substitution at Earthquakes Stadium with Bryce Duke replacing Brian Rodriguez.
Christian Torres is on a sub for Diego Palacios for Los Angeles.
In the minute 85, Corner awarded to Los Angeles.
San Jose have a goal kick.
Cade Cowell is replacing Cristian Espinoza for San Jose at Earthquakes Stadium.
In the minute 87, Paul Marie is replacing Chris Wondolowski for the home team.
Los Angeles to take a throw-in in San Jose territory.
Tim Ford signals a Los Angeles throw-in in San Jose's half.
Can Los Angeles get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in San Jose's half?
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Tim Ford signals a San Jose throw-in in Los Angeles's half.
Throw-in for Los Angeles in the half of San Jose.
San Jose needs to be cautious. Los Angeles have an attacking throw-in.
San Jose's Cade Cowell gets in a shot on goal at Earthquakes Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
San Jose have been awarded a corner by Tim Ford.
Can San Jose capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Los Angeles's half?
Throw-in Los Angeles.
Los Angeles awarded a free kick in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 3-2.
Goal! The away team reduce the deficit to 3-2 through a strike by Diego Rossi. .
Carlos Vela instrumental with a fine assist.
